title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: ETCYY Womens Oversized Sweater Cozy Fall Long Sleeve Button Up Denim Polo Pullover Tops Sweatshirt Tunic Collared Sweaters

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, soft, and comfortable, appreciating its heavy weight and suitability for fall and winter.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater with swag
items.body: Very nice sweater, nice quality. Beautiful chocolate brown. The denim is denim, no fake look alike pieces. The gold buttons are a pretty gold not brassy. This sweater has some weight to it, definitely warm but not too thick. The details in the sweater give it something where you don’t have to layer a ton of shirts to get a really nice look. Not just a regular boring old sweater either. The size was as advertised, I did not feel the need to change my usual size. I wore this all day for Thanksgiving and it was comfortable and moved with me in the kitchen and after all day. I am considering ordering another color. Definitely worth it! Read more
items.author: claz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grab this one!
items.body: Love this sweater! I’m normally a size XL in tops just bc I like it roomier, but read reviews and got the Large. It’s perfect. I’m 5’11” and the length is great on me. I’ve worn and washed once—no piling or snags or fading. It’s soft & high quality, the denim is a good weight on collar and sleeves. I love the style to dress up or down. Don’t wait on this—grab it! Read more
items.author: shanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft feels good
items.body: So happy with this sweater. Happy with the quality. It’s soft and runs slightly bigger than my normal size. Usually a medium but ordered a small and it’s slightly baggy but just what I wanted. Length of sleeves are a tad long but not too bad since you fold back the cuffs. Would recommend! Color looks just as pictured. Read more
items.author: Courtney

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Sweater runs large. Nice quality. I may change out the gold buttons... just a little gaudy in my opinion. Read more
items.author: Susan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality!
items.body: This sweater is amazing! The color is spot on, it’s super comfortable to wear! It fits amazing and the length is great to size! Read more
items.author: Jose Ramirez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall great quality, truly oversized sweater....Cheap buttons and questionable collar/cuffs.
items.body: It's a really nicely made sweater. Very thick and soft. I'm giving 4 stars because of the buttons. They have a much "cheaper" feel to them that takes alot away from the sweater itself. Not crazy about the feel and color on the collar/cuffs either. It could possibly look better after a few washes, but then how will the sweater itself look? Could I change the buttons??? Sure, but I'm unsure if I want to mess with it or not. I got it on sale and would say overall it is a nice sweater. However, I personally would not pay full price of $40. Still debating on whether to return or not. Read more
items.author: Goodwitch1073

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish :)
items.body: Very pretty and good fit Definitely size down !!! Even a small is still relaxed and I usually get a medium tops even a large at times . Over all its very nice .. Read more
items.author: jessica R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size Down
items.body: Like this shirt. Looks great with jeans but it runs really large. Should have ordered a small. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Striped Black, Pure White, Striped Plaid, Striped Pure Navy, Pure Navy, Striped Pure Blue, Double Khaki, Pure Black, Striped Pure Black, Color Navy, Pure Coffee, Color Caramel, Striped Apricot, Pure Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
